messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Inflation and the Tooth fairy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/03/2000 12:47:15 PM !!!First Boot!!!, thediva@worldnet.att.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/03/2000 12:47:15 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
thediva@... writes:

<<
> Gosh I'm cheap. The tooth fairy gives a quarter here.
>
Gee, Marbleface,

I rescind my earlier post. I want YOUR tooth fairy in my neighborhood.

However, there is a real and present danger that, if at this point, our
tooth fairy took to leaving quarters, my kids might well rise up and knock
HER teeth out!!

Shirley >>


Tooth Fairy abuse!!!! :)

Nance

<<
> ps Our tooth fairy gives a silver dollar for the first tooth lost, and a
> quarter after that. :)

Ours gives $5 for every tooth. I guess she needs to lower her standards :-)

Amy
Mom to Samantha, Dana, and Casey

Amy, If our tooth fairy gave that much, the kids would take turns trying to
knock each other's teeth out.

---Valerie >>

Gosh I'm cheap. The tooth fairy gives a quarter here.
